divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home from work. In the northwest part of Vegas. I wasn't really doing anything but thinking of getting home. Suddenly I noticed this giant light above me from my windshield. It looked like it was no higher than a helicopter would be surveying the area. But, once I looked and saw this giant light, before I knew it .. it zipped and raced off into the distance north into a dot of nothing in seconds! I honestly first thought. That was a ufo. I have never seen one. I have never given much thought to them. Or interest. In fact, two months before I told someone "i dont' think one way or the other, i believe anythign is possible. im just probably one of those people that will never see anything." I just found out tonight. The day after that the UFO conference was here in Las Vegas. I still don't know if it could be a star or comet, being so close to the earth and going straight forward into some warp of speed into nothing.
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There was one other sighting in Las Vegas on or around November 10th 2007
Summary: a giant ball of pure white light... high up above car then zipped and raced ahead into nothing.
